name: DIN EN
description: German/European standards for hydraulic engineering (DIN EN 752, DIN EN 1916, DWA-A 110).
references: DIN EN 752:2017 — Drain and sewer systems outside buildings — Sewer system management
DIN EN 1916:2002 — Concrete pipes and fittings, unreinforced, steel fibre and reinforced
DWA-A 110:2006 — Hydraulic dimensioning and verification of drain and sewer systems
disclaimer: Values are representative defaults for educational and engineering estimation purposes. Always verify against current published standards for design submittals.
